pullrequest.title: Load GUI Plugins with gzclient parameter -g, fixes issue 1311

content.raw:
Thanks for running the tests.
I fixed the style issues, let me know if there is anything else.

One comment left to resolve: in RenderWidget.cc about the plugin type. I'm happy to remove the extra check.
content.html:
Thanks for running the tests. I fixed the style issues, let me know if there is anything else.
